text: Debra Parkes is a professor of law and chair in feminist legal studies at Peter A. Allard School of Law, University of British Columbia, a position she assumed on July 1, 2016. Before moving to UBC, she was associate dean of research and graduate studies and executive director of the Legal Research Institute at Robson Hall, University of Manitoba. == See also == * Feminist legal theory ==References== == External links == * Profile at Peter A. Allard School of Law * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Robson Hall faculty Category:Peter A. title: Debra Parkes
